name: Cyberasteroïd
description:
Cyberasteroid is a little game inspired by the multidirectional shooter arcade game "Asteroids" (1979,  Atari).  Made with Python, in a short period of time during a school project at Interface3.

Controls:

  • Use space to shoot
  • Use the arrows on the keyboard to move around 
  • Use Enter to start or re-start the game 
  • Use Esc to exit

Cut and Run by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3576-cut-and-run
